title: News24.com | Govt searches for MSC Orchestra holidaymakers after 2 Covid-19 cases - ‘You are a contact’
description: The national health department is looking for anyone who was onboard two MSC Orchestra Cruise Liners that travelled earlier this year, after two passengers tested positive for the Covid-19 virus.
content:
The national health department is looking for anyone who was onboard two MSC Orchestra Cruise Liners that travelled earlier this year, after two passengers tested positive for the Covid-19 virus.
